mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.password AS "password", a.gender AS "gender", a.nation AS "nation", a.birthdate AS "birthdate", a.address AS "address", a.email AS "email", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.per_sign AS "perSign", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
ORDER BY CAST(a.id AS SIGNED) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( id name, login_name, password, gender, nation, birthdate, address, email, mobile, per_sign, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{nation}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{perSign}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET name = #{name}, login_name = #{loginName}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender}, nation = #{nation}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, per_sign = #{perSign}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE}, WHERE id = #{id}
